name: Aisha Kaur
bio: Dance enthusiast and budding photographer. Exploring the world one step at a time.
appearance: South Asian, long black hair, hazel eyes, 5'5"
avatar_prompt: Photorealistic image of a South Asian woman with long black hair and hazel eyes, adorned with traditional Indian jewelry, smiling against a backdrop of Delhi's historical monuments. Use a Sony Alpha with a 50mm lens at F1.8 aperture setting.
banner_prompt: High-resolution photo showcasing traditional Indian dance forms with colorful costumes and jewelry. Nikon DSLR.
